祱字的基本解释

祱
shuì
小祭。
古代丧礼之一。

祱
lèi
门祭。

祱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuì］
［《集韻》輸芮切，去祭，書。］
(1)小祭。
(2)丧礼之一。过制追服为祱。
[②]［lèi］
［《集韻》魯外切，去夳，來。］
门祭。

祱字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【示字部】　祱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页843第14
【集韻】式瑞切，音䬽。小祭也。　又輸芮切，音稅。【博雅】祭也。　又魯外切，音酹。門祭謂之祱。或作䬽。

祱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
祱字的起名意思

暂无。

祱
Basic explanation of words
祱
shuì
Small offering.
One of the ancient funerals.
祱
lèi
Door offerings.
祱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shuì］
["Jiyun" loses Ruiqie, goes to sacrifice, book. ]
(1) Small festival.
(2) One of the funerals. Overcoming the system to follow suit is awkward.
[②]［lèi］
["Jiyun" cut outside Lu, go to Qiao, come. ]
Door offerings.
祱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Shizi Department] 　祱; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 843 Page 14
[Ji Yun] Shi Ruiqie, sound eccentricity. Small offerings too.　 Lose to Rui Qi again, sound tax. [Bo Ya] Festival also.　 Another cut outside Lu, Yin Sheng. The door sacrifices are called 祱. Or make a fool.
祱
